issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: I have this issue when i'm change content on the object.... Im Russian and it is very important to me.....Please tell me step by step how fix it....
fields.summary: Failed to update settings object: invalid byte sequence in UTF-8
fields.environment: Failed to update settings object: invalid byte sequence in UTF-8......

comments.body: Hello, This issue is fixed in ArrowDB latest stable versions 1.3.0. Please check. Check [community|https://community.appcelerator.com/topic/3012/failed-to-update-settings-object-invalid-byte-sequence-in-utf-8/11] post. Thanks.
